Content: A child died after he was entangled in an electric cable in Belipara, Nawalapitiya. Police stated that the ten-year-old child was found entangled in an illegally- laid electric line at a poultry farm in the vicinity, during search operations conducted following a complaint lodged citing that the child had gone missing. Police stated that the child passed away upon admission to the hospital.The person responsible for laying the illegal electric cable was arrested.
